question:
Consider the following operations carried out by Indian Armed Forces with countries associated to them:
  1. Operation Rahat - Yemen
  2. Operation Sankat Mochan - Iraq
  3. Operation Surya Hope - Nepal
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Operation Surya Hope was carried by Indian Army officials in Uttarakhand to save people during the North India floods in 2013. Operation Rahat was an operation of the Indian Armed Forces to evacuate Indian citizens from Yemen. Operation Sankat Mochan was a operation of Indian Air Force to evacuate Indian Citizens and other foreign nationals from South Sudan after Civil War broke in South Sudan between forces of the government and opposition forces.
